answers.answer: OK. Your question really has 2 parts even though it it asked as one.First - normal blood sugars 2 hours after a meal.  2 hours after a meal your blood sugar should be very close to normal - that is usually a sufficient time for most of the food to be digested.Second.  Fasting levels.  92 is not high.

question: WHAT WOULD A NORMAL BLOOD SUGAR FOR CHILDREN TWO HOURS AFTER A MEAL.  IS 92 TOO HIGH FOR A FASTING BLOOD SUGAR IN AN 8 YEAR OLD?THANKS,ZACSGRANNY
title: CHILDREN AND DIABETES
